data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Katni.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Katni, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Katni against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Katni, Madhya Pradesh, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Katni you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Rajput Gaur people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Katni, Madhya Pradesh, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,262,112, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Katni, Madhya Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
